name: James River Group Holdings, Ltd.
description: James River Group Holdings, Ltd. is a specialty insurance and reinsurance company that provides a range of insurance products to businesses and individuals across various sectors. Founded in 2003 and headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda, the company operates through multiple segments including Excess & Surplus Lines, Specialty Admitted Insurance, and Reinsurance. James River is committed to delivering innovative solutions and exceptional service to its clients, leveraging its expertise in underwriting and risk management. With a robust portfolio that includes coverage for property, casualty, and liability, the company primarily targets niche markets, providing tailored insurance solutions that meet the unique needs of its customers. James River's strategic focus on disciplined underwriting and strong risk assessment has enabled it to build a solid reputation in the insurance industry. The company aims to achieve sustainable growth while maintaining a strong balance sheet, ensuring that it can meet its obligations to policyholders and stakeholders. Through its commitment to excellence and a customer-first approach, James River continues to expand its presence in the competitive insurance landscape.

seo.meta_description: Explore James River Group Holdings, Ltd., a leading specialty insurance and reinsurance provider. Discover innovative insurance solutions and risk management services.

faq.answer: Neil E. Harris is the CEO of James River Group Holdings, Ltd.

faq.answer: James River Group is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.

faq.answer: James River Group offers Excess & Surplus Lines, Specialty Admitted Insurance, and Reinsurance products.

faq.answer: James River Group was founded in 2003.
